title: High ping spikes last 2 weeks
body: The past two weeks when I log on to play around 9pm EST to about midnight, I get CRAZY lag spikes, being located in ohio, I have 48 ping after server move and everything was fine till about two weeks ago and now its like every other game my ping is 400, if I close and reload still around 400. I'm too scared to do my rank placement games because Its so inconsistent. has anyone else been experiencing stuff like this or have any idea whats going on?

replies.body: im getting the same problem around the same time, although not as much ping.  for 2-3 hours every day around 5-8pm pst i get 200+ ping, the rest of the time i get 63.  i know its not my internet because i get normal ping from every other server i test.
